name: Simple Spaceships
description:
Simple Spaceships is a simple arcade game to waste a few hours of your day. The concept is simple, and I tried my best to make it feel as smooth as possible.

Downloading is highly recommended (available for Windows, Mac and Linux). However, you can always play it in browser.

If there's any error please report it in the comment section, I will be glad to fix it and learn from it (if possible)

Instructions: use arrow keys to spin, press Z to shoot.

Also, the yellow meteors are bs, but I'm too lazy to change them. Good luck with that.
